Exercise 1
Task 1 - In our eyes, the solution fits as it is. We have nothing to remark.
Task 2 - In our eyes, the solution fits as it is. We have nothing to remark.

Task 9 - In our eyes, the solution fits as it is. We have nothing to remark. Automat for Query 2: We have nothing to remark. Automat for Query 3: Our suggestion for improvement is: auc1.auction = auc.auction AND auc.price = 0.5 * a[a.LEN].price (on right arrow) Automat for Query 4: Our suggestion for improvement is: auc1.auction = auc1.auction = auc.auction AND auc.price + (auc.price * 0.8) < a[a.LEN].price (on right arrow)
